action.action-desc: Ms. Kuster introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To increase the size of the Northeast Home Heating Oil Reserve, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Home Heating Oil Price Reduction Act.

subsection.header: Strengthening the Northeast Home Heating Oil Reserve
subsection.text: Section 181(a) of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6250) is amended by striking 2 million and inserting 4 million.
Section 183 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6250b) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking Definition and inserting Definitions;
by redesignating paragraphs (1) and (2) as subparagraphs (A) and (B), respectively (and adjusting the margins accordingly); and
by striking For purposes of this section a dislocation in the heating oil market and inserting the following:
the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea;
any other country the government of which is subject to sanctions imposed by the United States; and
any entity owned, controlled, or influenced by—

clause.text: a country referred to in any of subparagraphs (A) through (F); or

paragraph.text: a dislocation in the heating oil market

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2), by striking ; and and inserting a semicolon;
in paragraph (3), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: the Secretary shall prohibit the sale or export of petroleum distillate released under this section to a covered entity, except that the Secretary may issue a waiver of such prohibition if the Secretary certifies that any export or sale authorized pursuant to the waiver is in the national security interests of the United States.

subsection.text: Title III of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2012 (division B of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2012 (Public Law 112–74; 125 Stat. 869)), is amended, under the Northeast Home Heating Oil Reserve account, by striking : Provided further, That notwithstanding section 181 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act (42 U.S.C. 6250), for fiscal year 2012 and hereafter, the Reserve shall contain no more than 1 million barrels of petroleum distillate.
